text: We're not saying Fifth Harmony knew the future when they made "Work From Home" but we're not not saying it

1. Assistance for first responders engaged in frontline medical & other efforts to fight the virus 2. Support for children & educators who are now working and learning remotely 3. Aid for the creative community in entertainment which has been affected by the virus's spread

Today, we're proud to announce the Sony Global Relief Fund for COVID-19, a $100 million fund to support those around the world affected by the novel coronavirus. Through the fund, we'll be providing support in three areas:
